subject: Re: Greetings To You,Mildred
body:
Re: Greetings To You,Mildred

Your reply is well noted. The process is that you forward your full
personal details. I will use it and issue an affirmation of the beneficiary
document and send it to you.

When you receive the document you will send my legal fee of USD5,500 as
stated. When I receive it I will procure all the legal documents on your
behalf and forward it to the bank.and copy  you.

The bank will contact you immediately if they receive my approval as the
legal consultant then subsequently request for your bank account details
where the USD5.5 Million will be wired to.

On your question about the bank customer and your wish for transparency I
hereby give you in confidence the details of the sick bank customer. You
can reach Dr Mrs Monica Nano via email monicanano2018@outlook.com
Best Regards

Joseph A. Miller,

subject: Re: Greetings To You,Mildred
body:
Hello Joseph A. Miller,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. Just to clarify, could you please explain what kind of document you will be issuing and sending to me? And what exactly are the legal documents that you will be procuring on my behalf?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the bank customer you mentioned, Dr Mrs Monica Nano. What is her current situation and how can she be reached via email? I'm interested in understanding more about her story.

Looking forward to your reply.

Best wishes,
Mildred
